name: assetbar_admin
text: A comment left by assetbar_admin was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, Feste, kenthegod, MisChef, jeffreyquah, Shawgun, m1st3rbl4ck)

name: zaratustra
text: Ogg Vorbis maybe?

name: jackparsons
text: They're nerds, but not that kind. More the kind of Chinese nerds who memorize millions of English words to be the kings of Scrabble, but do not actually speak English.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Is ... is that a thing?

name: fermatprime
text: It is totally a thing. More Thai nerds than Chinese, though.

name: dusty
text: Memorizing 10000 words of a language you don't intend to learn is still less of a waste of time than memorizing 67890 digits of pi when even NASA only uses 9 in the most pressing circumstances. You can't even use that to play a game.

name: zaratustra
text: I am calling the patent office with both phones.

name: soticoto
text: Now you're making me imagine Chinese scrabble... One tile holds a whole word, so they make sentences with them instead. One point for Rice, ten points for Democracy. Bonuses for proverbs and koans. World champions writing out the Tao Te Ching across the board.

name: schmonday
text: 'Probably .flac

name: dondoran
text: Or .aac, never know with those mother truckers.

name: supernintendochalmers
text: man i want one of those quilts

name: nsrdude
text: Me too! When I become a vegetable after crashing one of my bikes, I think it would be fitting.

name: hipjiverobot
text: The proposed quilt in this comic made me say "awwww" and that is not something I say very often.

name: dsquid

name: achilleselbow
text: I dunno man, a retarded Ray seems pretty easy to write and I, for one, would have liked to see more of it. But maybe it was too easy and the humor wouldn't be quite Achewood. Or maybe he realized that there was no way to  top the peach bit.

name: zombie
text: Yeah, you could just loop yourself saying "shucks" as many times for all eternity as long as there are bytes to save the MP3 on. Guinness don't like that at all.

name: lint
text: A comment left by lint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pubdoggy, NYU, wertt, electricjelly, JuanCarlos, SoManyWhales, atticusonline, czarcastic)

text: marked as spam? that was a reasonable comment. He posts some stupid ideas often in an arrogant and insufferable tone, but marking that as spam is childish in the extreme.

name: rowboat
text: I've been preaching that logic for awhile, but the Old Guard are pretty set in their ways.

name: treelaufe
text: what.

name: asherdan

name: aperson
text:
You can still hear the lambs, can't you Agent Asherdan.
Screaming, in the night...?

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, JUNKO, Mangtastic, Cypher, fosters, bug, equinn2006, electricjelly, JuanCarlos, teluxe, Hexjumper, SPECTRE)

name: boredom_man
text: I think his point is that you are a woman. Go fix me turkey pot pie.

name: asherdan
text:
Y'know, with a year to reply you could try for better than incomplete sentences and trite & tired insults from the elementary school yard.

ALSO: if I fix you a turkey pot pie, you promise to eat it? It'd be the last meal you'd ever need.

name: boredom_man
text:
woman woman woman woman
WOOOOOOMAAAAAAAN

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Asherdan is often upset that other posters have not made effective use of the considerable time between his assetbar visits to come up with replies more well-thought out.

He gave you a year, boredom_man, and you squandered it. Let this be a lesson to you.

name: twohundredninety
text:
Yeah. The system is totally broken. Particularly telling is that a comment posted by the AssetBar administrative account has been marked as spam.

Maybe that'll alert somebody to fix things, at least.

name: assetbar_admin
text:
Sorry fellow acheworlders. Obvioulsy there are a few douches out there trying to take a dump on everyone else's fun.


Without saying too much, we're working on some things to clean up their mess. Thanks for your patience.

name: wolfslice
text:
Without saying too much, I think *IP BLOCKS* would do very nicely.

I love you, assetbar_admin!

name: nyu
text: From my understanding successful message board forums have a appointed responsible members with various levels of power. Limiting the "spam" exclusion power to a few active members would greatly reduce or eliminate this problem. Furthermore a 'temp block' and 'IP Ban' options would be given to other levels of admins. Just a thought.

name: i_love_kate
text: Says the person who lamed untold amounts of innocuous messages just four or five strips ago.

name: zem
text: thanks for looking out for the rest of us, i_love_kate

name: theguitarhero
text: i_love_kate: He Pays Attention.

name: rowboat
text: Two years later we realize that assetbar_admin is full of terrible lies.

name: gothfae

name: achilleselbow
text: To get the answer, set your lame limit to 1, then scroll back down to the post in question. You will see a list of people who lamed it. In the case of unjustified lames, such people should be publicly called out.

name: tellumo
text: Being Ray's lawyer would be a weird and wonderful job. His penchant for crazy schemes would ensure a never-ending stream of matters requiring counsel . . . then again, Ray's never struck me as the sort of guy to seek advice of counsel in the first place.

text: what is with ray and wearing clothes lately?

name: thommy_h
text: Ray always rocks that jacket. I think it's just part of his indoor attire.

name: jeannetteandre
text: His track suit, martini and medallion are integral to his business decisions.

name: thommy_h
text: Wtf? My comment got deleted as spam? All I said was that Ray always wears that tracksuit around the house.

name: jaydub
text: And his shades are fixed!

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, gothfae, equinn2006, atticusonline)

name: nurdbot
text: I approve of the neatness of the Smuckles 'Duo Creamy Headed Buddies' plan.

name: seven47
text: I thought it said fuck, and not tuck, for like the first three reads.

name: plummet
text: I am relieved that Ray's face is back to normal

name: morganization
text: i love the quilt idea

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Cypher, equinn2006, atticusonline, MR_Wilson)

name: tonyhighwind
text: Ray always has an out.  You will never catch that dude flat-footed.

text: A comment left by nyu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lacrimus, co1chester, TTAGXAMM, domini)

name: neonfreon
text: A comment left by neonfreon was marked as spam and excluded. neonfreon: What a douche. (reported by smallgods, MR_Wilson, stoned_lightning)

name: stoned_lightning
text: What exactly do you and the rest of these lame fucks actually hope to achieve by doing this?

name: stoned_lightning
text: Oh uh sorry you can delete that or something now that it's been all spammed away.

name: fantomeciel
text: The second to last frame is one of my favorite ever. Amazing.

name: scramblesthedog
text: I would have liked to see this storyline continue for a while more.  A creamy-noggined Ray seems like a good source of hilarity.

name: qingofchina
text: Now Onstad has unknowingly committed himself to making a blanket as well. I hope that it will be made of the same crappy fabric that the children's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle blankies were made of.

name: mira
text:
It may be a pain in the ass, but you can still view each comment individually by clicking on the link in the spam message.

Just ignore the fools doing this shit, though.

name: jeannetteandre
text: I am a big fan of Onstad's use of "retardancy"

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sargasm, atticusonline, dropkickpikachu)

name: alejandroadam
text: awwh. I wanna give this a chubby, I approve this comment. down with haters.

name: leon_sumbitches
text: hmm...I am sorry my friends, i am new to the whole assetbar concept but isn't the "spam" button for bad posts? these seem like pretty reasonable posts to me!

name: lint
text:
they're for spam posts - you know, by bots or adwizards.

but i guess the same knuckleheads are going to ruin things so when this thing actually DOES attract spam bots, stuff will be useless.

name: molesticide
text:
i mean, this is supposed to be a forum for talking about the strip, but i figure i'll add my two cents about this whole 'spam' business as well.

out of curiosity, i checked out one of the spam posts, completely at random.

all the post was was a guy typing in the alt text.

how is that spam? i immediately suspect foul play.

name: solobuttons
text:
Yeah, I'd like to see alt-text in these pages as well anyway.

THE GUY WAS A SAINT.

name: cdawg116
text: who the hell goes around marking other people's posts as lame for kicks that is like a level of lame ive seriously never encountered before on the internet or am i missing something here or something

name: plezure
text: A comment left by plezure was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TonyHighwind, equinn2006, JuanCarlos)

name: newwavepony
text: I also have a Retardation Clause with my Best Friend Superior. It's a good idea unless you would rather watch the Golf Channel and eat pureed ham until the end of days.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I really hope Beef gets a cut of all the good ideas he gives Ray.

name: peng33
text: Wow, it's nice to see that Ray's glasses healed up too.
